amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow military personnel and their dependents overseas to use their own funds to obtain abortion services in military hospitals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in part A of House Report 107-450 to restore equal access to health services at overseas military hospitals to servicemen and women and their dependents stationed overseas, by limiting the restriction of the use of DoD medical facilities to perform abortions to facilities in the U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 215 (Roll no. 153).
